overview: Known as Lil Boosie, Torrence Hatch serves up tough-talking raps with Southern flavor in this collection of music videos, interviews with the artist and live concert footage of Boosie's hard-hitting performances. The Baton Rouge, La., rapper opens up in a candid interview in which he talks about his struggles with diabetes, his father's tragic death and his red-hot music career.
title: Lil Boosie: Bad Azz
